raccoon scarers.description: Scare away the birds without a fake owl.

roman_candles.name: Roman Candles
roman_candles.description: A firework giving off a series of flaming colored balls and sparks..

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: A small rocket that is approximately the size of a standard firecracker, one and one-half inches long, with a thin stick attached to it that is approximately 12 inches in length. Bottle rockets can contain whistle effects and may contain a report (loud bang).

ammonia_nitrate.description: Fertilizer mixed with diesel makes a big bomb.

instant_cold_packs.description: Extract ammonium nitrate from your instant cold packs.

nitropaste.name: Nitropaste
nitropaste.description: Can be rubbed on a person's skin to revive the heart.

door_remover.name: Door Remover
door_remover.description: Can be sprayed on a car to blast off the door.

nitropaste.name: Nitrostat
nitropaste.description: Spray on your throat when you have a sore throat.
